snippet: President Obama on Thursday sought to link Christian values to his recent message of economic justice for the middle class.
abstract: President Obama on Thursday sought to link Christian values to his recent message of economic justice for the middle class.
lead_paragraph: President Obama, speaking Thursday at the National Prayer Breakfast in Washington, sought to link his recent message of economic justice for the middle class to Christian values.

headline.main: At Prayer Breakfast, Obama Ties Economic Message to Christian Values
